
## ``get_Chrome``
Downloads Chrome

#### Description

Downloads Chrome in app_dir. If Chrome has already been downloaded, get_Chrome will use that file. If the download fails it will stop.

#### Usage
<pre><code>

get_Chrome(app_dir)14
get_Pandoc

</code></pre>

#### Details

#### Value
chrome_installer.exe in app_dir.
